nodes.text: The Wayfar Cloning Facility could be found in the small desert town of Wayfar, on the planet Tatooine, at the time of the Galactic Civil War.
It was situated in a small, sand-colored building with an unknown number of floors below ground. It contained the technology necessary to clone beings, as well as a 2-1B droid.

The cloning facility is a place in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It provides players with a place to respawn ("clone") on Tatooine after they have been killed. The canonical status of such cloning facilities in Star Wars Galaxies is unknown.

The type of building used for this cloning facility is also used in many other places on Tatooine in the game. It usually features a turbolift to access two lower levels, but the buttons to operate the elevator were removed in this building.
